description: {"blocks":[{"key":"758pk","text":"A procedure utilising a UV crosslinker to expose isolated DNA to UV radiation with the aim of inducing lesions in the DNA typical of that kind of damage induced by UV.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"3sh1g","text":"Human Genomic DNA - Human Mixed - G3041 1 × 100μg","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"288sl","text":"UVP Crosslinker CX-2000","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4t03","text":"Dilution buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"828sa","text":"Gibson P20 pipette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dkk5g","text":"Wide bore tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"757j","text":"Sterile petri dish","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpec4","text":"Eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"d3hkp","text":"Douki, T. and J. Cadet (2001). \"Individual Determination of the Yield of the Main UV-Induced Dimeric Pyrimidine Photoproducts in DNA Suggests a High Mutagenicity of CC Photolesions.\" Biochemistry 40(8): 2495-2501.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9jl7","text":"Muylaert, Isabella \"Saturation energy of UVC on genomic DNA\" personal communication","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9mfnp","text":"Expose tube to UV light using Crosslinker at 254 nm to exposing the cells to 800 J/m2 (80000 μJ/cm2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":84,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":98,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9dso","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5b3lm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"UVP","can_edit":1,"file":{"icon":"https://www.protocols.io/img/extensions/jpg.png","id":390907,"name":"crosslinker.jpg","source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/m7z5b7pxf.jpg"},"guid":"452CBD30341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":null,"link":"https://www.uvp.com/products/lab-equipment/uvp-crosslinker/","name":"UVP Crosslinker CX-2000","sku":"95-0339-02","specifications":"254nm wavelength 8W","type":"UV Crosslinker","vendor":{"id":766,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://shop.analytik-jena.com/de/en","name":"Analytik Jena"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8osvs","text":"Press the ENERGY button, enter the exposure energy of 80000 microjoules/cm2 as 80 on the keypad.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":74,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df44k","text":"Note: YOUR ENERGY EXPOSURE SETTINGS DISPLAYED MUST BE MULTIPLIED BY \n100 to obtain the exposure in microjoules/cm2. If settings are correct, push ENTER on the touch pad. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":113,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2nt8g","text":"Press START button to activate crosslinker and wait for cycle to finish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: UV Exposure Protocol
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"4u83t","text":"Ultraviolet Crosslinkers are a powerful source of ultraviolet radiation. Even though they are not easily accessible, do not attempt to disengage or override the internal safety interlocks. Exposure to the UV radiation may result. If the UV sources remain on when the door is open, the unit is malfunctioning and use should be discontinued until the unit is serviced. Do not expose unprotected eyes or skin to UV radiation. Always disconnect the UV Crosslinker from its electrical supply before servicing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
